page.title: 15SCHOOLS IN BRYNFORD
page.content: Brynford Primary school (Ysgol Gynradd in Welsh) was opened in 1964.It has 55 children.There are three classes, a hall, a kitchen, toilets, a staff room and a corridor. Our class is the first class and there are 14 children in our class 7 girls and 7 boys.The middle class has 16 children and the Infant class has 21 children and 5 Nursery children. We have three teachers and a Nursery Assistant. There are four kitchen staff who cook our meals in the kitchen. We also have a lady care-taker who opens and cleans the school. Ysgol Talfryn is a special school for children who have problems.As well as their lessons they go swimming, canoeing and for walKS.A number of their pupils are residential, the rest come in each day by taxis.
